## setNonVRCameraMode() function

Adjust the camera for non-VR mode.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function setNonVRCameraMode(camera: THREE.Camera, cameraOffset: THREE.Object3D, avatar: Avatar, isFirstPerson: boolean): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  camera | THREE.Camera |  |
|  cameraOffset | THREE.Object3D |  |
|  avatar | [Avatar](./three-avatar.avatar.md) |  |
|  isFirstPerson | boolean | First person view or 3rd person view. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
